Text:
This server is FREE to PLAY on.
Those who have downloaded it and played on the server please leave a comment here for everyone else to know how you like it.

Works perfectly,The seed is good, it will be a pleasure to give my seed :)

But the problem is, there's nobody,but i'll try to find some friends who will be able to play it too :)

Thank you, i'm gonna ask to some of mine
Around how many players do you have on the server?

There are 20 registered players. I have uploaded 40GB+ which would equal 20+ more players but people are downloading but not registering. I made guest accounts to entice people to register. The more registered players the better. All servers start small. I need players help to grow too.
Okay,My player name is Zelf Eray,It will be nice to meet you guys.
Had a great time playing! Its an easy install and the server is great all it needs is more players.
If possible it would be cool to not play in a single game, because we are not a lot in this server, So to play in a normal game To join the others would be cool.
hey i want to start playing this. i became a fan on phantasy star since i started playing the one on the ds. i hope to start playing soon. i will email my user name and pw so u can register me
Hey man i would like to send you a username to play can you tell me how

From now on, all NEW accounts will be added in on Mondays. When I add accounts I have to restart the server. For those Monday players, I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause if you are momentarily disconnected.
